description.value:
You suffer from persistent pain that flares during stress.

  • Mild (3): At start of combat or during extended physical activity, make [[/save type=will]] (1 success required). On failure, add 1 to all die results for 1d8 rounds.
  • Severe (5): As Mild, but [[/save type=will]] is at Misfortune (1 success required). On failure, add 2 to all die results for 2d8 rounds.
